question: Hello! I just found you thanks to that post about how animals play with toys and let me just say, I wish I found you sooner! I'm about to take my own ethology final exam on Weds., and it would have been so helpful if I could have read all your ethology related posts before hand. (some times I still feel like I don't even have the proximate and ultimate perspectives down D:< ) You have so many examples of stuff I could relate back to my classroom! Anyway, I love your blog and all that you post!
